title: Password Reset Policy
content: Users can reset their password by navigating to Settings > Security > Reset Password. A verification email will be sent.

title: Refund Policy
content: Customers can request a refund within 30 days of purchase if the product is unused and in original condition.

title: Account Deactivation
content: Users can deactivate their account from the Account Settings page. Deactivated accounts can be reactivated within 60 days.

title: Shipping Policy
content: Orders are processed within 2-3 business days. Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days.

title: Data Privacy Policy
content: User data is encrypted and stored securely. We do not share personal information with third parties without consent.
